about_the_game:
Using our industry leading character maker, you can realize your full creativity, making the girl of your dreams come to life and enjoy a passion filled night indulging in your shared desires~


Let go of the leash on your creativity, and let it all out in the included Studio, where only your imagination puts brakes on what you may create. With our permissive license model, you may take your created scene from this game and use it to make derivative products! (*)


Passion Eye is built, from the ground up, to facilitate the ultimate in user creativity, modding. This game comes with everything needed to create mods, and to manage installed mods. With our permissive policies regarding distribution of mods (*), you can allow your users to support your work on creator support platforms.

* - Subject to Terms of Service

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains somewhat revealing outfits, and user generated content can cause output to be seen as sexually suggestive.

detailed_description:
Using our industry leading character maker, you can realize your full creativity, making the girl of your dreams come to life and enjoy a passion filled night indulging in your shared desires~


Let go of the leash on your creativity, and let it all out in the included Studio, where only your imagination puts brakes on what you may create. With our permissive license model, you may take your created scene from this game and use it to make derivative products! (*)


Passion Eye is built, from the ground up, to facilitate the ultimate in user creativity, modding. This game comes with everything needed to create mods, and to manage installed mods. With our permissive policies regarding distribution of mods (*), you can allow your users to support your work on creator support platforms.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 (3GB VRAM) or better
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended, specs may be subject to change throughout Early Access Development
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 12700 / Ryzen 7 3700X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon 6700 XT (12GB VRAM) or better
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended, specs may be subject to change throughout Early Access Development

name: Passion Eye

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 (3GB VRAM) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended, specs may be subject to change throughout Early Access Development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 12700 / Ryzen 7 3700X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon 6700 XT (12GB VRAM) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Storage is recommended, specs may be subject to change throughout Early Access Development

short_description: Create your own character and unleash your creativity! Create the girl, or boy, of your dreams and engage in a heart pounding story of vice, or pose your characters in interesting scenarios using the included Studio mode!
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
